channel.title: Graph Embedding on Aviv Segall
channel.description: Recent content in Graph Embedding on Aviv Segall

item.title: Fabric Tessellation: Realizing Freeform Surfaces by Smocking
item.description: The paper introduces a method for utilizing an embroidery technique called smocking to realize freeform surfaces from a flat piece of fabric. By combining directional field computation and continuous planar graph optimization, our algorithm outputs a stitching pattern that generates an approximation of the target shape upon stitching.

item.title: Digital 3D Smocking Design
item.description: The paper presents a method for digitally previewing a smocking pattern design by formulating smocking as a graph embedding and shape deformation problem.
